    Womens Jeans

    Abercrombie & Fitch denim is made with exceptional comfort and fit. Thoughtfully designed with extraordinary quality and attention to detail, from womens jean leggings and vintage-inspired mom jeans to relaxed boyfriend and skinny fit styles, our denim is made to be lived in. Hems range from full length to ankle length in every wash to take you from season to season. Find your signature fit in a variety of rises fit to flatter, including our new 11.5-inch Ultra High Rise. All Abercrombie womens denim pants feature on-trend ripped details and authentic wash effects. Our entire assortment is available in sizes 24 to 33 in short, regular and long.
